column5: A friend just e-mailed this to me.  I would be very suprised if it has not been posted here before, but thought I would post any ways.  Could you imagine if this happend to you!!!
thats not a bear-- thats a seal.

it was posted on here about a week ago. but i still like watching it--lol  wonder why the edited out the 6 year old school girls screams followed by the immediate evacuation of the bowels sound? ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I saw this, thinking it was a bear as well. My wife was more than happy to point out the error of my ways.
Well the seal just saw an opportunity  Just like this penguin did...  Smart Penguin  Joey
Believe thats actually a sea lion

I was kind of thinking same thing, but wasn't sure.  Either way.  Crazy..  Sorry for posting something that was just posted a week ago.  I check this site a few times a day (except for weekends), and I don't remember seeing this before..
I haven't seen that before. Pretty cool actually.
